name: Prison 44
description:
The goal of the game is pretty straight forward... Find the Four Medallions and Get Out. 

This project has multiple levels to it, but because of Itch's file size limit, I'm forced to upload these levels as stand alone games... So more levels coming. Also, this whole project has been more of a learning process for myself, which is why these levels will be free to download. If you like it, or you hate it, let me know in the comments. Any criticism you may have will be greatly appreciated! 

Also, any of you Game Developers playing this, hit me with your criticisms as well. Thanks.
